name: identity (itch)
description:
IDENTITY is my first adventure novel game about a story i am writing since 2001. three main locations, about 25 different screens and many translated text sites of my original novel called "das grab eines dichters/ the grave of a writer". the story: You are a psychotherapist with a lonely house near a little town and among a nice natural landscape, inspecting some secrets ... But the appearance of a strange patient changes everything. ESCAPE the novel and find out your real IDENTITY!

here you get an exclusive edition with identity adventure game & soundtrack including some bonus (lofi) songs of my music demotape "die achse der falschen propheten / the axis of the false prophets":

https://soundcloud.com/maschinentraum/id-snippet
